import React, { Component, useRef, useState } from 'react' import { Button, Checkbox, Form, Input, Radio, Select, TextArea, } from 'semantic-ui-react' const CreatePubForm = () => { const [title, setTitle] = useState(null) const fileInputRef = useRef() return(
setTitle(e.target.value)} placeholder='Title' />
) } export default CreatePubForm
